identity.name: MOZTEC
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Balinese warmth with Swiss financial precision
Content is King: Data clarity is paramount
Zoom In: Focus on currency details
Negative Space: Breathable layouts even in dashboards
Contrast: Gold on Emerald, Cream on Black

headings.usage: All major section headers, hero text, and brand names. Use tracking-tight for sizes > 32px.

body.usage: General text, data tables, inputs, and labels.

mono.usage: Currency rates, transaction IDs, and code snippets.

buttons.primary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(212,175,55,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 font-semibold

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on dark backgrounds to prevent banding.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Colored shadows! Use shadow-emerald-900/50 for depth.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid white/10 for structure, Gold borders for active states.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Jewel & Luxury' theme strictly. No default shadcn slate/gray.
Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
Ensure the dashboard uses the 'Control Room' grid layout.
Customize all Shadcn components to match the Emerald/Gold palette.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings to maintain the premium feel.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark emerald backgrounds.
Do not use gradients for text, only for backgrounds or borders.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar/header structure for the dashboard.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - no generic centered layouts.
